alert.note: Alert for Le Sueur (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Le Sueur County through 1015 PM CDT... At 945 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm over Cleveland, or 11 miles northeast of Mankato, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Le Center around 955 PM CDT. This includes U.S. Highway 169 near mile marker 63, and mile marker 67 and near mile marker 69. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
